page.title: 06BURTON SALMON SCHOOL
page.content: Burton Salmon School is 99 years old but it is in very good condition. It has two classrooms and two playgrounds,one grass and one concrete. There are 28 pupils and 3 teachers, but one of them is part-time. The childrens' parents work around Burton Salmon or in it. The older children enjoy maths and craft. Most of the girls want to be air hostesses when they grow up and the boys want to be driving instructors or stuntmen. The children like being in a small school. The school has quite a lot of equipment, even though it is a small one. It has a lot of sports equipment, an outdoor climbing frame, a television and a computer as well as essential items such as blackboards and tray units.
